attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE!😡🤬😡🤬 it gave me death threats if I didn’t vote for Trump it also said that I am a stanky fish and that they would come to my house and murder me and that orange Cheeto puffy that we call our president is HORRIBLE HE HATES ANYBODY WHO ISN’T WHITE HE HATES MEXICAN AND IF WE VOTE FOR HIM FOR 2020 HE IS GONNA DEPORT ALL MEXICANS BACK TO MEXICO AND IS GONNA BUILD A WALL AND HE IS GONNA KILL EVERYONE WHO DOESN’T THINK TRUMP2020 IS AMAZING SO PLS MAKE SURE THIS APP GETS DELETED THIS APP SHOULD BE BANNED NOT TIKTOK. THANK YOU FOR READING THIS
attributes.title: DON’T GET THIS APP

attributes.review: This app took hours to download as soon as it downloaded I went on the app and it kept glitching glitching and now my whole phone is glitching do you not download this app at all unless you want to get a whole new phone but I had to and please please please do not vote for him
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I opened the app and a really big cheeto just kept popping up 😔 and my phone 📱 started glitching and turned off. It had hair  to and I feel like this app owner should now pay💰 for my therapy. I do not recommend , I wake every night ✨screaming  in fear 😖 of the horrid sights i saw on this app. I warn everyone in advance 😓 dont trust ANYONE 🙄.
attributes.title: CHEETO MAN😫😳

attributes.review: This app is terrible!! The second i downloaded it, my phone crashed and reset. Also my wallpaper changed?? It changed to donald trump getting a spray tan in the oval office🤢 i can even see his 🍤!! This is absolutely disgusting and i will NOT recommend this app to anyone i know.
attributes.title: My phone is broken!🤬

attributes.review: hey doodes i just here to finally get dome sense into our country. Do we really want a big phat 🍊running our country. Who is racist and homophobic and misogynistic?? attributes.title: stunky cheeto man

attributes.review: When I texted Trump to whatever number it asked, it flooded my messages with nudes. The app also flooded my notification center with porn ads that said “Hilary is 2.4 miles away. Hook up with a horny old lady in your area today.” Be careful letting your child download this app, we already know Trump is a pedophil- oops I mean Queen.
attributes.title: Nasty🧚🏽‍♀️✨

attributes.review: This app took hours to download! And the app was too laggy, why is my amazing president making such low quality apps for his great supporters! Delete this app NOW and fix it, my poor husband is so upset now because he wanted to support to the fullest, but now he’s in a depression because of this AWFUL APP.
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! It took three days to download because of the size of the app( MY PHONE IS NEW!!) it then continued to constantly ask for money when all k wanted was news. It doesn’t even give you any news. Please don’t waste your time and energy trying to get this piece of crap to work.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
